about_me.text: Hello, I´m Barbora Lambeinova. What I love about coding is the creativity of solutions and almost endless possibilities.

competencen.text: I usedd a variety of front-end technologies. You can take a look on the ready projects in the next section.

work.text: Explore the selection of my work here - interact with the projects to see my skills in action.
work.description: Pokedex. A little project to see my work with APIs.
